15#include <config.h>
16
17#include <stdbool.h>
18
19#include <isc/app.h>
20#include <isc/lib.h>
21#include <isc/magic.h>
22#include <isc/mem.h>
23#include <isc/once.h>
24#include <isc/socket.h>
25#include <isc/task.h>
26#include <isc/thread.h>
27#include <isc/timer.h>
28#include <isc/util.h>
29
30#include <dns/client.h>
31#include <dns/lib.h>
32
33#include <irs/context.h>
34#include <irs/dnsconf.h>
35#include <irs/resconf.h>
36
37#define IRS_CONTEXT_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('I', 'R', 'S', 'c')
38#define IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(c) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(c, IRS_CONTEXT_MAGIC)
39
40#ifndef RESOLV_CONF
41/*% location of resolve.conf */
42#define RESOLV_CONF "/etc/resolv.conf"
43#endif
44
45#ifndef DNS_CONF
46/*% location of dns.conf */
47#define DNS_CONF "/etc/dns.conf"
48#endif
49
50static bool thread_key_initialized = false;
51static isc_mutex_t thread_key_mutex;
52static isc_thread_key_t irs_context_key;
53static isc_once_t once = ISC_ONCE_INIT;
54
55
56struct irs_context {
57 /*
58 * An IRS context is a thread-specific object, and does not need to
59 * be locked.
60 */
61 unsigned int magic;
62 isc_mem_t *mctx;
63 isc_appctx_t *actx;
64 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr;
65 isc_task_t *task;
66 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr;
67 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr;
68 dns_client_t *dnsclient;
69 irs_resconf_t *resconf;
70 irs_dnsconf_t *dnsconf;
71};
72
73static void
74ctxs_destroy(isc_mem_t **mctxp, isc_appctx_t **actxp,
75 isc_taskmgr_t **taskmgrp, isc_socketmgr_t **socketmgrp,
76 isc_timermgr_t **timermgrp)
77{
78 if (taskmgrp != NULL)
79 isc_taskmgr_destroy(taskmgrp);
80
81 if (timermgrp != NULL)
82 isc_timermgr_destroy(timermgrp);
83
84 if (socketmgrp != NULL)
85 isc_socketmgr_destroy(socketmgrp);
86
87 if (actxp != NULL)
88 isc_appctx_destroy(actxp);
89
90 if (mctxp != NULL)
91 isc_mem_destroy(mctxp);
92}
93
94static isc_result_t
95ctxs_init(isc_mem_t **mctxp, isc_appctx_t **actxp,
96 isc_taskmgr_t **taskmgrp, isc_socketmgr_t **socketmgrp,
97 isc_timermgr_t **timermgrp)
98{
99 isc_result_t result;
100
101 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, mctxp);
102 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
103 goto fail;
104
105 result = isc_appctx_create(*mctxp, actxp);
106 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
107 goto fail;
108
109 result = isc_taskmgr_createinctx(*mctxp, *actxp, 1, 0, taskmgrp);
110 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
111 goto fail;
112
113 result = isc_socketmgr_createinctx(*mctxp, *actxp, socketmgrp);
114 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
115 goto fail;
116
117 result = isc_timermgr_createinctx(*mctxp, *actxp, timermgrp);
118 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
119 goto fail;
120
121 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
122
123 fail:
124 ctxs_destroy(mctxp, actxp, taskmgrp, socketmgrp, timermgrp);
125
126 return (result);
127}
128
129static void
130free_specific_context(void *arg) {
131 irs_context_t *context = arg;
132
133 irs_context_destroy(&context);
134
135 isc_thread_key_setspecific(irs_context_key, NULL);
136}
137
138static void
139thread_key_mutex_init(void) {
140 isc_mutex_init(&thread_key_mutex);
141}
142
143static isc_result_t
144thread_key_init(void) {
145 isc_result_t result;
146
147 result = isc_once_do(&once, thread_key_mutex_init);
148 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
149 return (result);
150
151 if (!thread_key_initialized) {
152 LOCK(&thread_key_mutex);
153
154 if (!thread_key_initialized &&
155 isc_thread_key_create(&irs_context_key,
156 free_specific_context) != 0) {
157 result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
158 } else
159 thread_key_initialized = true;
160
161 UNLOCK(&thread_key_mutex);
162 }
163
164 return (result);
165}
166
167isc_result_t
168irs_context_get(irs_context_t **contextp) {
169 irs_context_t *context;
170 isc_result_t result;
171
172 REQUIRE(contextp != NULL && *contextp == NULL);
173
174 result = thread_key_init();
175 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
176 return (result);
177
178 context = isc_thread_key_getspecific(irs_context_key);
179 if (context == NULL) {
180 result = irs_context_create(&context);
181 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
182 return (result);
183 result = isc_thread_key_setspecific(irs_context_key, context);
184 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
185 irs_context_destroy(&context);
186 return (result);
187 }
188 }
189
190 *contextp = context;
191
192 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
193}
194
195isc_result_t
196irs_context_create(irs_context_t **contextp) {
197 isc_result_t result;
198 irs_context_t *context;
199 isc_appctx_t *actx = NULL;
200 isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
201 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr = NULL;
202 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr = NULL;
203 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr = NULL;
204 dns_client_t *client = NULL;
205 isc_sockaddrlist_t *nameservers;
206 irs_dnsconf_dnskeylist_t *trustedkeys;
207 irs_dnsconf_dnskey_t *trustedkey;
208
209 isc_lib_register();
210 result = dns_lib_init();
211 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
212 return (result);
213
214 result = ctxs_init(&mctx, &actx, &taskmgr, &socketmgr, &timermgr);
215 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
216 return (result);
217
218 result = isc_app_ctxstart(actx);
219 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
220 ctxs_destroy(&mctx, &actx, &taskmgr, &socketmgr, &timermgr);
221 return (result);
222 }
223
224 context = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*context));
225 if (context == NULL) {
226 ctxs_destroy(&mctx, &actx, &taskmgr, &socketmgr, &timermgr);
227 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
228 }
229
230 context->mctx = mctx;
231 context->actx = actx;
232 context->taskmgr = taskmgr;
233 context->socketmgr = socketmgr;
234 context->timermgr = timermgr;
235 context->resconf = NULL;
236 context->dnsconf = NULL;
237 context->task = NULL;
238 result = isc_task_create(taskmgr, 0, &context->task);
239 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
240 goto fail;
241
242 /* Create a DNS client object */
243 result = dns_client_createx(mctx, actx, taskmgr, socketmgr, timermgr,
244 0, &client, NULL, NULL);
245 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
246 goto fail;
247 context->dnsclient = client;
248
249 /* Read resolver configuration file */
250 result = irs_resconf_load(mctx, RESOLV_CONF, &context->resconf);
251 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
252 goto fail;
253 /* Set nameservers */
254 nameservers = irs_resconf_getnameservers(context->resconf);
255 result = dns_client_setservers(client, dns_rdataclass_in, NULL,
256 nameservers);
257 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
258 goto fail;
259
260 /* Read advanced DNS configuration (if any) */
261 result = irs_dnsconf_load(mctx, DNS_CONF, &context->dnsconf);
262 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
263 goto fail;
264 trustedkeys = irs_dnsconf_gettrustedkeys(context->dnsconf);
265 for (trustedkey = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*trustedkeys);
266 trustedkey != NULL;
267 trustedkey = ISC_LIST_NEXT(trustedkey, link)) {
268 result = dns_client_addtrustedkey(client, dns_rdataclass_in,
269 trustedkey->keyname,
270 trustedkey->keydatabuf);
271 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
272 goto fail;
273 }
274
275 context->magic = IRS_CONTEXT_MAGIC;
276 *contextp = context;
277
278 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
279
280 fail:
281 if (context->task != NULL)
282 isc_task_detach(&context->task);
283 if (context->resconf != NULL)
284 irs_resconf_destroy(&context->resconf);
285 if (context->dnsconf != NULL)
286 irs_dnsconf_destroy(&context->dnsconf);
287 if (client != NULL)
288 dns_client_destroy(&client);
289 ctxs_destroy(NULL, &actx, &taskmgr, &socketmgr, &timermgr);
290 isc_mem_putanddetach(&mctx, context, sizeof(*context));
291
292 return (result);
293}
294
295void
296irs_context_destroy(irs_context_t **contextp) {
297 irs_context_t *context;
298
299 REQUIRE(contextp != NULL);
300 context = *contextp;
301 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
302
303 isc_task_detach(&context->task);
304 irs_dnsconf_destroy(&context->dnsconf);
305 irs_resconf_destroy(&context->resconf);
306 dns_client_destroy(&context->dnsclient);
307
308 ctxs_destroy(NULL, &context->actx, &context->taskmgr,
309 &context->socketmgr, &context->timermgr);
310
311 context->magic = 0;
312
313 isc_mem_putanddetach(&context->mctx, context, sizeof(*context));
314
315 *contextp = NULL;
316
317 (void)isc_thread_key_setspecific(irs_context_key, NULL);
318}
319
320isc_mem_t *
321irs_context_getmctx(irs_context_t *context) {
322 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
323
324 return (context->mctx);
325}
326
327isc_appctx_t *
328irs_context_getappctx(irs_context_t *context) {
329 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
330
331 return (context->actx);
332}
333
334isc_taskmgr_t *
335irs_context_gettaskmgr(irs_context_t *context) {
336 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
337
338 return (context->taskmgr);
339}
340
341isc_timermgr_t *
342irs_context_gettimermgr(irs_context_t *context) {
343 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
344
345 return (context->timermgr);
346}
347
348isc_task_t *
349irs_context_gettask(irs_context_t *context) {
350 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
351
352 return (context->task);
353}
354
355dns_client_t *
356irs_context_getdnsclient(irs_context_t *context) {
357 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
358
359 return (context->dnsclient);
360}
361
362irs_resconf_t *
363irs_context_getresconf(irs_context_t *context) {
364 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
365
366 return (context->resconf);
367}
368
369irs_dnsconf_t *
370irs_context_getdnsconf(irs_context_t *context) {
371 REQUIRE(IRS_CONTEXT_VALID(context));
372
373 return (context->dnsconf);
374}
